basics.name: Sarah Chen
basics.label: Senior Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Passionate full-stack developer with 7+ years of experience building scalable web applications. Expertise in React, Node.js, and cloud architecture. Strong advocate for clean code and test-driven development.

work.name: TechCorp Inc
work.summary: Leading development of cloud-native SaaS platform serving 50K+ users.
highlights: Architected microservices architecture reducing deployment time by 70%
Led team of 5 developers in migrating legacy monolith to React/Node.js stack
Implemented CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions and AWS, achieving 99.9% uptime
Reduced API response time by 60% through database optimization and caching
Mentored 3 junior developers and conducted weekly code review sessions

work.name: StartupHub
work.summary: Built and maintained multiple client-facing web applications.
highlights: Developed responsive e-commerce platform handling $2M+ in annual transactions
Implemented real-time chat feature using WebSockets serving 10K concurrent users
Integrated payment systems (Stripe, PayPal) with robust error handling
Created reusable component library reducing development time by 40%

work.name: Digital Solutions Ltd
work.summary: Contributed to various web projects and learned modern development practices.
highlights: Built RESTful APIs using Express.js and MongoDB
Developed responsive UI components using React and Material-UI
Participated in Agile sprints and daily standups

volunteer.summary: Building websites and web applications for non-profit organizations.
highlights: Created donation platform for local food bank, increasing online donations by 150%
Mentored students at coding bootcamp workshops
Organized monthly hackathons for social good projects

publications.name: Building Scalable React Applications: Best Practices
publications.summary: A comprehensive guide on architecting large-scale React applications with performance optimization techniques.

publications.name: Microservices Migration: Lessons Learned
publications.summary: Case study on successfully migrating a monolithic application to microservices architecture.
